author: Aylah
text:
Last night I browsed your IG reminiscing all the happy memories.  Your journey shared to us has always been one of our greatest joy. Longing for you, and today you just turned twenty and three .

KISSES HappyAt23
#KissesDelavin 
@KissesDelavin https://t.co/emLvtJt4Vx

author: Aylah
text: Should've told them they read the books first . https://t.co/Ahkho1H3xN
